name: Polyjuice Potion
effect: Allows a human drinker to temporarily assume the form of another person
side_effects: Attempts to transform into animals or part-humans will not reverse automatically
characteristics: Thick and mud-like, Bubbles slowly, Taste and colour vary depending on the person being turned into
ingredients: Lacewing flies (stewed for 21 days), Leeches, Powdered bicorn horn, Knotgrass, Fluxweed (picked at full moon), Shredded boomslang skin, A bit of the person one wants to turn into (typically hair)
